channel.title: InYourBones — Bay Area Radar (short_term)
channel.description: Curated upcoming Bay Area shows from InYourBones.

item.title: TWICE @ Oakland Arena
item.description: 2026-01-19 04:00 — TWICE at Oakland Arena. TWICE is a global K-pop sensation with a massive following, promising a high-energy show at Oakland Arena.

item.title: Jason Isbell and the 400 Unit @ Fox Theater - Oakland
item.description: 2026-01-30 04:00 — Jason Isbell and the 400 Unit at Fox Theater - Oakland. Jason Isbell and the 400 Unit are celebrated for their storytelling and musicianship, making their show at Fox Theater a highlight.

item.title: MxPx @ The Fillmore
item.description: 2026-01-25 04:00 — MxPx at The Fillmore. MxPx has a dedicated fanbase and a strong live reputation, making their performance at The Fillmore noteworthy.

item.title: JADE @ The Fillmore
item.description: 2026-02-04 04:00 — JADE at The Fillmore. JADE's 'That's Showbiz Baby! The Tour' is generating buzz, promising an engaging performance at The Fillmore.

item.title: Cate Le Bon @ The Fillmore
item.description: 2026-01-31 04:00 — Cate Le Bon at The Fillmore. Cate Le Bon's unique sound and strong live reputation make her show at The Fillmore a compelling choice.

item.title: Arooj Aftab @ Palace of Fine Arts
item.description: 2026-01-24 04:30 — Arooj Aftab at Palace of Fine Arts. An Evening With Arooj Aftab offers a unique musical experience at the Palace of Fine Arts, highlighting her acclaimed artistry.

item.title: Say She She @ August Hall
item.description: 2026-01-28 04:00 — Say She She at August Hall. Say She She's 'Cut & Rewind Tour' is gaining traction, making their show at August Hall a noteworthy event.

item.title: Bad Omens @ Oakland Arena
item.description: 2026-03-28 02:00 — Bad Omens at Oakland Arena. Martin Garrix is a leading figure in electronic music, and his performance at Bill Graham Civic Auditorium is sure to attract a large crowd.

item.title: Dark Star Orchestra @ Fox Theater - Oakland
item.description: 2026-02-07 03:30 → 2026-02-08 03:30 — Dark Star Orchestra at Fox Theater - Oakland. Freya Skye's 'Stars Align Tour' is generating excitement and offers a fresh pop experience at Fox Theater.

item.title: Dave @ Fox Theater - Oakland
item.description: 2026-04-01 03:00 — Dave at Fox Theater - Oakland. Atmosphere's 'Winter Carnival Tour' promises a vibrant hip-hop experience at Fox Theater, appealing to a diverse audience.

item.title: Snow Strippers @ Fox Theater - Oakland
item.description: 2026-02-22 04:00 — Snow Strippers at Fox Theater - Oakland. Snow Strippers at Fox Theater promises a unique and fun experience, appealing to those looking for something different.

item.title: Aleman @ San Jose Civic
item.description: 2026-02-04 04:00 — Aleman at San Jose Civic. Aleman & Gera MX's 'Rich Mafia Tour' is set to deliver a vibrant performance at San Jose Civic, appealing to hip-hop fans.

item.title: Sam Smith @ The Castro Theatre
item.description: 2026-02-12 04:00 → 2026-02-25 04:00 — Sam Smith at The Castro Theatre. Sam Smith's 'To Be Free' tour is highly anticipated, drawing significant attention at The Castro Theatre.

item.title: Ray Volpe @ Bill Graham Civic Auditorium
item.description: 2026-01-25 03:30 — Ray Volpe at Bill Graham Civic Auditorium.
